description:
A simplistic clock-calendar combo inspired by ToshimonsterRealm, based on Matt Juggins' clock-calendar combo over at CodePen (codepen.io/mattjuggins/pen/WGRRYx).

I just made the full port to WE, added a couple of customisation presets and a customisable background. Go to your steam directory/steamapps/workshop/431960/this background's id to find the full instructions in the README file.
title: Circular Calendar 2.0
